Spins¶

Contains representations for spin configurations.

class ising.spins.SpinConfig[source]¶

Represents a general spin configuration.

Canonical

ising.spins.SpinConfig

__len__()[source]¶

Gets the number of positions in the spin configuration.

Raises

NotImplemented

__getitem__(index, value)[source]¶

Allows for subscripting.

Raises

NotImplemented

__setitem__(index, value)[source]¶

Allows for assigning to a position.

Raises

NotImplemented

__iter__()[source]¶

Allows for iterating over the positions.

Raises

NotImplemented

__str__()[source]¶

Returns a string representation using spin-arrow notation to show the spin state.

Returns

A string with up and down arrows.

magnetization()[source]¶

Returns the spin excess of the configuration. That is, the number of up spins minus the number of down spins.

Returns

The spin excess.

class ising.spins.SpinMatrix(data)[source]¶

Represents a spin configuration set up with an array of 1’s and -1’s representing up and down spins. Implements all the base methods.

Parameters

data (list(int)) – A list of 1’s and -1’s.

class ising.spins.SpinInteger(numeral, length)[source]¶

Represents a spin configuration determined from the binary representation of an integer.

Parameters

  • numeral (int) – The number whose binary representation gives the spin state.

  • length (int) – The number of particles in the Ising system.

__iter__()[source]¶
Returns

A _SpinIntegerIterator that represents the object.

copy()[source]¶
Returns

A copy of this object.

class ising.spins._SpinIntegerIterator(other)[source]¶

Iterator class for SpinInteger.

Parameters

other – The SpinInteger object to iterate over.
